xwikidoc.content:
# Homepage diagram.app.title=Diagrams
# Template Provider diagram.template.name=Diagram diagram.template.description=Diagram page
# Live Table diagram.livetable.doc.location=Location diagram.livetable.doc.date=Update Date diagram.livetable.doc.author=Last Author diagram.livetable._actions=Actions diagram.livetable._actions.edit=Edit diagram.livetable._actions.delete=Delete diagram.livetable.emptyvalue=-
# Diagram Macro rendering.macro.diagram.name=Diagram rendering.macro.diagram.description=Displays a diagram. rendering.macro.diagram.parameter.reference.name=Reference rendering.macro.diagram.parameter.reference.description=The reference of the page that contains the diagram to display. E.g. for "http://.../Diagram/My%20Diagram/", enter "Diagram.My Diagram.WebHome". If this field is left blank, the macro looks for a child page named "Diagram" and if not found, displays a form to create a diagram. rendering.macro.diagram.parameter.cached.name=Cached rendering.macro.diagram.parameter.cached.description=Whether to display the cached diagram image (faster) instead of rendering the diagram live (slower). diagram.macro.invalidReference=The specified page is not a diagram. diagram.macro.viewNotAllowed=You are not allowed to view this diagram. diagram.macro.createNotAllowed=You are not allowed to create this diagram. diagram.macro.view=View diagram diagram.macro.edit=Edit diagram diagram.macro.create=Create diagram
